page.title: 09Rest Home, Adbaston, Doctors
page.content: The Manor, Bishops Offley, is a private Rest Home for elderly people. It is Nurse owned and Nurse managed and provides comfortable accommodation for 15 residents. Set in 8 acres of grounds, it has fruit, flower and vegetable gardens, also a small poultry and farm area. Recreational facilities are provided for residents and visitors; Hairdressing and Chiropody services can be arranged:; residents can consult their own G.P. or use the local doctor. The Manor has an ambulance which is used for shopping and recreational purposes as well as being available for emergencies. Most interviewees said they were healthy and satisfied with doctor services in Eccleshall and Newport.
